Around the Shop Window Fishery Harbor

The „mile“ in the historic part of Bremerhaven`s Fishery Harbor with restaurants, cafés, bistros, pubs, maritime shops, the Fischbahnhof, the seafish cooking studio, the Expedition Northern Seas and many other attractions.

A maritime attraction, unique in Northern Germany, is located in the historic part of the more than 100-year-old Bremerhaven Fishery Harbor: the Shop Window Fishery Harbor. Both tourists and locals appreciate the varied range of entertainment options, gastronomy, information and overnight accommodations. Upscale restaurants and cosy harbor pubs are located next to each other in the former Packhalle IV. Here you have a chance to observe how the smoking of fish is carried out. A great variety of seafood is not only sold and eaten here, but in the new Seafish Cooking Studio we also give you valuable hints on how to prepare it properly and toothsomely at home. In the "Expedition Northern Seas" in the 'Fischbahnhof' experience the Unterwasswerwelten the Nordic seas. In the nearby harbor basin, the last German side trawler FMS „Gera“ provides you with an insight into the drudgery of the fishermen. In the PHÄNOMENTA you will get fun for the whole family, there you will experience phenomena to touch and understand in a scientific-technical surrounding with exhibits from nature and technology. The Comfort-Hotel with the adjacent fitness area, the new Best Western Hotel, the authentic potato ship „Hansa“, the popular harbor cruise trip and the bicycle station with Tourist Information complement the offering. And in the evening, you can enjoy a varied cultural program in the TiF, the Fishery Harbor Theatre. There is always something going on here…

Impressions

Jazz, pub music, the FischParty, dragon-boat races, running events or other maritime events – the Shop Window Fishery Harbor is almost unsurpassed in terms of variety, creativity and ideas when it comes to providing unforgettable impressions for the guests of the maritime city of Bremerhaven.

content: © Schaufenster Fischereihafen • Tourism • Ships & Harbors Recommend page Listen Around the Shop Window Fishery Harbor The „mile“ in the historic part of Bremerhaven`s Fishery Harbor with restaurants, cafés, bistros, pubs, maritime shops, the Fischbahnhof, the seafish cooking studio, the Expedition Northern Seas and many other attractions. Water games in the fountain on the market place in the Shop Window Fishery Harbor © Schaufenster Fischereihafen A maritime attraction, unique in Northern Germany, is located in the historic part of the more than 100-year-old Bremerhaven Fishery Harbor: the Shop Window Fishery Harbor. Both tourists and locals appreciate the varied range of entertainment options, gastronomy, information and overnight accommodations. Upscale restaurants and cosy harbor pubs are located next to each other in the former Packhalle IV. Here you have a chance to observe how the smoking of fish is carried out. A great variety of seafood is not only sold and eaten here, but in the new Seafish Cooking Studio we also give you valuable hints on how to prepare it properly and toothsomely at home. In the "Expedition Northern Seas" in the 'Fischbahnhof' experience the Unterwasswerwelten the Nordic seas. In the nearby harbor basin, the last German side trawler FMS „Gera“ provides you with an insight into the drudgery of the fishermen. In the PHÄNOMENTA you will get fun for the whole family, there you will experience phenomena to touch and understand in a scientific-technical surrounding with exhibits from nature and technology. The Comfort-Hotel with the adjacent fitness area, the new Best Western Hotel, the authentic potato ship „Hansa“, the popular harbor cruise trip and the bicycle station with Tourist Information complement the offering. And in the evening, you can enjoy a varied cultural program in the TiF, the Fishery Harbor Theatre . There is always something going on here… Impressions Visitors stroll along the shops and restaurants in the Shop Window Fishery Harbor © Schaufenster Fischereihafen Water games in the fountain on the market place in the Shop Window Fishery Harbor © Schaufenster Fischereihafen Terrace area overlooking the Fishery Harbor 1 © Schaufenster Fischereihafen Smoked fish counter in Fiedler's Fish Market © Schaufenster Fischereihafen Jazz, pub music, the FischParty, dragon-boat races, running events or other maritime events – the Shop Window Fishery Harbor is almost unsurpassed in terms of variety, creativity and ideas when it comes to providing unforgettable impressions for the guests of the maritime city of Bremerhaven.
